name: CSSCGC - ZX Redefine Keys - TheAdventure 2008
description:
Redefine Keys The Adventure 2008 (CSSCGC Entry *, **, ***)

-------------------------------------------

---------------

Introduction.

---------------

Hello , I'm the Redefine Keys The Adventure 2008. What is your name?

..Pleased to meet you . 

Now, that the introduction is made lets say something else :

Now, its time for you to try the ULTIMATE game.

Now, you don't just press random buttons!! You must think before you press a key. YES THINK !!!

Redefining keys have never been more realistic!!!

-------------

Description

-------------

Redefine Keys The Adventure 2008 is an amazing and superb game that will have you abandon War Of Warcraft, Medal Of Honor & all the other games that are in the market.

It will challenge all your skills even physical (eg you could run arround the room while you play this game).

-------------

Instructions:

-------------

The game features an interactive full AI help system that handles the helping system.

So, just follow the instructions of the game.

-------------

Controls:

-------------

All controls re fully redefinable!

This game lets the user select from a great variety of control methods.

The alpha version of this game that was released in the early 70s,was the first program that

allowed to redefine the X-Y axis of the Wii Stick on the ORIGINAL SPECTRUM!!

Also , this program lets you redefine the voice commands .

Cause of a misconfiguration in the internal voice recognition instruction set of the z80 ,the process is done 4 times faster than the normal speed.

This has the advantage that the voice commands are instantly recognized but you must speak 4 times slower to allow the system to understand you.

---------------

Main features :

---------------

-Realistic descriptions!!

-Amazing backgrounds taken from National GEographic Mags. 

-The redefine keyboard algorithm is the most advanced ever written. 

  The leaders of the 5 more powerfull companies 

  want to buy the rights to this code!!

-Its the first Spectrum game that uses the undocumended commands that unlock the quad core capabilities of the z80!!

-A team of professional programmers & cooks were hired 

  just to make sure  the game is realistic

-It features an AI mechanism to make sure you won't forget the game keys!!!

  

---------------  

Requirements:

---------------

-A normal spectrum emulator -if you want to take a glipse of this game.

-A spectrum with 4GB Ram (not shared) required if you want to use the 

   quad core undocumented features of the game.

   (sorry,but a real specrum is required because all the emulators are very 

    poorly coded so they can't understand the hidden spectrum intrustions 

that the AI machine uses)

---------------

Known Bugs:

---------------

-NO BUGS. Only features!

---------------------------------------------
